title: Resource Loading Vulnerability
description: The code loads resources using `::LoadImage` without validating the input. This could potentially lead to loading arbitrary resources if an attacker can control the resource ID or name.
fix: Validate and sanitize the resource ID or name before loading it.

reasoning.pattern: Use of `::LoadImage` with user-controlled input without validation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could exploit this by providing a crafted resource ID or name that points to a malicious DLL, leading to arbitrary code execution.
